def_cn: (尤指政治动乱的)爆发点，一触即发之际
def_en: A flashpoint is the moment at which a conflict, especially a political conflict, suddenly gets worse and becomes violent.

def_cn: 政治动乱地区;危险地区
def_en: A flashpoint is a place which people think is dangerous because political trouble may start there and then spread to other towns or countries.
